website_summaries.verdict: This comfortable and quality pillow comes at a great value, especially given the fact that it comes in three different sizes.
pros: Conveniently comes in three different sizes to fit those of all heights and ages
Has soft, removable cover that zips closed and can be easily washed
Pillow is hefty enough to maintain its position while not being overly heavy
cons: Only comes in one color option, which is gray with a metallic-like finish

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed in this product. It's limp and flimsy due to the way they packaged it probably. Came in a big ball basically. And the insides are a mess. Do not recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: robin counts-dedear

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and flimsy for a 5ft 2in 135 lb woman
customer_reviews.text: Tiny for a 5ft 2in. Woman. Very flimsy also for 135 lbs. Bought the bigger one, cannot imagine how tiny a smaller one would be. Would not recommend it. Waste of money. Looks nice that's about it. PS...it doesn't matter how much it "fluff up" after 48 hours....it's still tiny. It goes up to the middle of my back. Has no neck support. Again I'm 5'2......
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C.

customer_reviews.title: Can be customized!
customer_reviews.text: What I appreciate most about this backrest reading pillow is that it has two zippered coverings: The attractive gray velour outer cover which can be removed and washed if needed; and the inner shape which is filled with shredded foam. To meet my specific support needs, I removed some of the foam shreds to make room to put a softer pillow between the inner shape and the outer velour covering. I was also able to add a little fiber-fill at the top to make it a bit higher. Now it is customized perfection! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Pat D.

customer_reviews.title: Every bed needs one!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't try this bc I saw a couple of reviews that criticized the size of the 18 inch version as small, but I am so happy that I took a shot. The size is perfect for me, average height and weight female. I work from home a lot, using a lapdesk and now this, sitting on my bed, and this is so comfy and supportive, as described and for an awesome price considering the amount of memory foam that went into this. The cover is thin, but really soft. I won't mind having to recover it shortly if that's the case. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not Shredded Memory Foam!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed and upset! We ordered both, the 18" and 14" because it was advertised as, "Shredded Memory Foam". Not true! The 18" was Memory Foam and very, very nice. But the 14" was not Memory Foam. It is well sewn, but the foam is cheap junk standard polyurethane foam. We'll be returning it immediately and I refuse to pay any shipping back to the Seller. IF both were constructed with Memory Foam I would easily given 5 Stars. Not good business practice...
customer_reviews.author: Rantasia

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great support. attached handle makes carrying easy - this pillow is pretty heavy. Can't comment on durability as time will tell (just been using for 4 days). I will buy another one. We use it on our sectional sofa for tv watching (and dozing). Fabric is soft.
customer_reviews.author: I'll try anything once

customer_reviews.title: Great reading pillows
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers, but not so small that a bigger kid couldn't use it. It arrived very compressed in its package, but fluffed up quickly. Very comfortable and so soft! I really love that the cover comes off it needs washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow but highly flammable
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow but highly flammable. Pillow is made out of polyurethane foam. Instructions included a caution which reads in part, “Polyurethane is flammable! Once ignited, polyurethane products will burn rapidly, releasing intense heat and consuming a great deal of oxygen, which can cause serious injury, suffocation, and/or death to nearby occupants.” Otherwise, the pillow is quite nice. The cover material is soft and non-irritating. Pillow is firm but comfortable. I do appreciate the caution include with the pillow as I did not notice a caution in the description of the pillow before I made the purchase. I threw the pillow away.
customer_reviews.author: Donnellda

customer_reviews.title: It's a little smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very happy with this bed rest pillow. It took its full shape in less than the recommended 24-48 hours. I'd have given it 5 stars except for the fact that it's a little smaller than what I was looking for. If the back of it were 3-4 inches higher, it would be perfect. I'm 5'1" tall, so for anyone taller, it probably wouldn't give full back support. Otherwise, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but small.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow measures 15" tall, as you can see in the picture. What I didn't realize was that 15" is too short for me, and I'm only 5' 7". Spoke to manufacturer, they said they're releasing a 24" inch version which is probably better for adults. Overall, this is a great pillow just be aware of the size.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, clunky and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. First of all, this thing weighs a ton. It comes compressed and takes a day or two to expand into an ugly awkward, uncomfortable useless lump. I want to return it, but it would be impossible to re-compress it into the original shipping box and I would have to hassle with finding a bigger box. The return postage would be so costly, I may as well just throw it in my car and take it to Goodwill where, hopefully, someone could find a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lee Metsger

customer_reviews.title: Supreme Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my couch to watch TV. Finally, after exhaustive search for perfect comfort, I'm happy. So glad I got the 24"x16"! Even though I'm only 5'2" it enable me to also rest my head on it for extra pampering! I highly recommend it...it's worth the money spent! ENJOY 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wyskida

customer_reviews.title: I received it and it was not what it said ...
customer_reviews.text: I received it and it was not what it said it was. Very small for a 2 yr. Old.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Enderton

customer_reviews.title: 24 inch pillow has good support!
customer_reviews.text: The new 24 inch Milliard Reading Pillow that I recently received is a huge improvement from the smaller 18 inch that I Previously ordered! I wrote a review prior to this one saying that the pillow was too small, and the company responded by sending me a larger pillow (they said that customer satisfaction was important to them so they created the larger version based on customer feedback). Great pillow that supports all of my back, up to my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No support so basically just an oversized pillow!
customer_reviews.text: No support so basically an oversized pillow! I give it one star for good support against a room corner or a sofa corner...so buy this if you plan on going not using it in these areas.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Jones

customer_reviews.title: One big pillow for sitting up against with great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft and comfortable and I like that the cover can be removed to wash.The pillow is truly very big and that is why i ordered a large size. I will be using it in my car on a blow up mattress to rest my back against the back trunk door. We are driving 6 hours home from my leg surgery and i need to be as comfortable as possible. I believe K will enjoy this pillow for years after my surgery when i want to sit up in bed. It is a good purchase for me. This is not an ordinary bed pillow. Much firmer and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Ezmerelda

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam fill is comfortable. But it’s small.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: This foam pillow is made for smaller physique people. The memory foam is nice and dense, and provides support. Pros: 1) Good quality memory foam. 2) Washable cover. 3) Good back support. 4) Comes in a compact, vacuum sealed package. 5) Foam is moderately washable. Cons: 1) This pillow is on the small side, maybe for people 5’-8” or less. 2) Not enough arm support. 3) Light color can get stains.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a GIFT...
customer_reviews.text: My husband found it "too bulky"...that's all. Nothing really wrong with it...it just didn't fit to his body, so unfortunately will have to return right after Thanksgiving Day. (the difficulty in returning is to REPACKAGE in this very narrow box, cuz I canNOT fold it tightly like your factory can and did. And quite frankly, found the manner in which it was "packaged" quite difficult to "undue".
customer_reviews.author: craig backhus

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pillow comes compressed and doesn't come to it's normal size at all. Very uncomfortable too. Gwt one from Target it's much cheaper and better
customer_reviews.author: Karan

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Chair Pillow Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy with this pillow. The firmness can be adjusted by removing some of the foam, which we did for my wife. The memory foam conforms to your body and the covering is very soft and easily removed and replaced for cleaning. It was ready to use within 4 hours out of the box, and we didn't notice any chemical odors at all. Very very pleased with this Milliard reading pillow. My wife uses it to sleep in the bed at night as she had heart surgery and needed a comfortable way to keep herself raised, this did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Mohrbach

customer_reviews.title: It's good but the size is too big for me
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the kids' sized pillow rest and loved it but thought i needed to go up one size when I needed to get a second one for myself. I was wrong. The next size up is too big, too heavy and bulky. I wish I purchased the kids' one. Unfortunately there is no way to shrink it back down to ship it back for a refund. It works and is fine, but it's just really big, a lot bigger than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: kstn's mom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy pillow
customer_reviews.text: I need to sleep sitting up for awhile, and this type of pillow allows me to sleep in bed instead of a chair. It's very comfy, especially since you can remove some of the stuffing to make it perfect for you. It smelled pretty bad the first couple of days, but the scent went away quickly enough that I won't count it against the product. It's very very stuffed when it arrives, and taking a bit of the stuffing out helps immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Reading pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!!! Looks exactly like the picture. Only negative was the pillow had/have a smoky odor. I washed the outside cover and the smell remains. My guess is the smoky cigar smell is coming from the foam.
customer_reviews.author: Rasheedah

customer_reviews.title: Buy. It. Now.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. This is just simply amazing. I haven't had a ‘husband pillow’ (that’s what they used to be called) since the mid 90s. But I wanted one for myself because i had surgery and needed to sleep elevated. It is SOOOO much better than the original. Talk about a silent come up. Well done!!!! It’s comfortable, arrived on time, after 48 hrs (which is suggested) of airing out, the smell went away and it got fluffy as it should. Easy to clean and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow because I wanted something more supportive behind my back when sitting on the couch or in bed. I got it a couple of days ago and already I think I need to buy 2 more because my kids are fighting over it! The cut memory foam pieces make a really comfy pillow. In addition to the inside, the outside is a really nice soft material as well. I would definitely recommend this and I will definitely be buying more as gifts as well. Great product and very amazing quality and comfort for the price!! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Celia B

customer_reviews.title: Soft, seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this on one of the reading pillows specified, so the fit wasn't as exact as it would probably be on those pillows, but I'm satisfied with it. I used it to cover a very fat pillow in curly neon pink and orange fake fur that my daughter had when she was a teenager. There is a little give to the fabric, but not a lot, so it took some forcing around the arms. The fabric is very soft. I haven't washed it yet, so am hoping it will still fit after I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: That product is not like the picture, there is not much in it.
customer_reviews.author: david cohen

customer_reviews.title: average pillow
customer_reviews.text: The product seems very durable. I agree with some of the other reviewers; I wish the back was higher and the arms a bit longer. Otherwise, I like it. The grey sheen is kind of shiny and makes it look cheaper than it actually is, but still a good pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this product
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product. After using it for several hours I got pain all over my body. I will not use it, but if somebody else I know wants it they can have it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Universal cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly old reading pillow that needed a new covering. I didn’t really want to replace it as it’s still comfortable, I was very happy to find this cover! It doesn’t fit mine perfect, but it’s good enough and I can wash it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love to read and play on my iPad both on the couch and on the bed. This reading pillow is truly amazing. It’s super soft, super flexible while offering support and comfort. It’s nice and squishy so I can rest my head on it. Perfect for readers or even for a binge fest on Netflix. I let mine air out for 48 hours and no complaints. This is not only works for me but also my 6’2 280lb hubby. High recommend
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Heaviest pillow I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: When the package was delivered the weight suggested I had received a big box of gravel. When I unwrapped the pillow, I couldn't believe how hard it was, and the shredded foam stuffing is obviously left-over trimmings from some other manufacturing process. Removing well over a cubic foot of stuffing made the pillow soft enough to use: it's reasonably comfortable, but hard to handle due to its size and weight. I'll keep it, but if I were doing it over I'd pick something smaller and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice alternative...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover and color. I took off one star because it fits a little big. Please make it in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Crab

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for bed or floor-reading!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very special bed / study pillow. Very comfortable, heavy enough to hold its position, and made to form with the body. Love that one can buy more stuffing, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesInNashville

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm Support
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of reading in bed and wanted a support pillow. The Millard pillow is excellent quality for the money and very well made. Unfortunately for me, the memory foam is too stiff. This would be excellent if you want very firm support. I wanted less. Still I would recommend this product. My age may be a factor in why it was not a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. LaMorgese

customer_reviews.title: The best money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would! It’s soft and comfortable and amazing! I bought it for after surgery recovery when I had to sleep sitting up, now I use it for reading and watching tv. It’s real memory foam and the cover is so soft! I bought a cheaper one first that was terrible. This gives just the right amount of support and never goes flat. Even though it’s filled with pieces, it never feels lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof10

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Smelled so bad when it came It came vacuumed sealed flat so I couldn’t return it even when I asked amazon what to do.. they told me to buy a box suggested one that was 18 dollars and said “they would reimburse me” 🤣 so I just tossed it sadly Literally money in the trash y’all Don’t Buy It
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Supportive with soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing how much this thing grows after you remove it from the package! I put mine in front of a box fan all night while it grew, and in the morning, it was full-sized and functional, with no trace of an odor. I think it’s important to let it spread out with a lot of ventilation. Now I love to read in bed with it, and my kids steal it for their beds. The fabric is soft, and the pillow is supportive. I like that it has a handle on top; makes it easier to confiscate off my kids’ beds.
customer_reviews.author: Sam King

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my mom to use on the couch, bed, or chair. As soon as she tried it, she loved it and provides back support while she sits on the couch. I've even used it while sitting on my bed to read. The only complaint I have is the zipper on the outside cover already broke. I think I can still get the cover off it just takes a bit more effort to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: A good product for the price. I bought mainly since you could unzip and wash, and not just wipe down. There were some noticeable loose strings. It was a good size, since I am 5'2.5" in height. If taller, I would recommend the biggest size. I bought the average adult size. They also sell a smaller one for children. I think the biggest size would have been more cozier, but I did not want it to stand out too much or take up too much space. I do not think these products are particularly attractive, but useful. 🌻
customer_reviews.author: Betty Ann Macaluso-Baratta

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Firm yet conforms to your body when you recline into it, generous sitting area, great support, & style is esthetically pleasing. Nice feature that the roll pillow detaches to place where you need it. It has some weight to it so have to put alittle muscle into it to move it, but the handle does help. Great purchase & recommend.
customer_reviews.author: leslie c

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA -FILLS A VOID!
customer_reviews.text: My review is not higher because I have not used on one of my pillows yet. I like the texture. I'd prefer more options in color perhaps a little darker regarding spots. The zipper doesn't appear real sturdy, I guess time will tell; and I don't know whether the form will hold until I wash the cover as per the instructions. I think this is a great product idea thus I have ordered two (2) more, but I'm reserving final judgement until I actually get them on my pillows and use them.
customer_reviews.author: ADHDC - Heritage

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my elderly mom who is a voracious reader. She absolutely loves it! She said it helps her sit up straighter, her back feels more comfortable and she loves that her arms are supported for holding her books. Yes I would recommend this pillow to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Young

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This is made of bits of memory foam. SOFT memory foam. Which sounds comfortable. Unfortunately what it means is that it simply squishes and provides ZERO SUPPORT. It is so flimsy I can simply grip it in my hand and squish it into nothing. The whole point of a pillow like this is to support you so that you can sit up. It doesn't do this. Do not buy this pillow. I've had it for only a couple days and I'm ready to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Solley

customer_reviews.title: HELPED ME SLEEP WHILE I HAVE BRONCHITIS!!
customer_reviews.text: This bedrest pillow is a lifesaver. I have bronchitis right now and can’t sleep in my bed at night. As son as I lay down I start to cough. I put this bedrest on top of 2 regular bed pillows and it sits up extremely high. I then lean back and am able to sleep sitting up. It’s helped me so much. It came so squished because they took the air out of it. I followed the directions and let it sit ( out of the plastic packaging) for several hours (8-10hours) and as if by magic it plumped up.
customer_reviews.author: Lida3209

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pillow for extra support during pregnancy and it's been a great help for sitting on the couch! Also plan on using it for nursing Update So I've had it for 2 years now and I still love it. The foam had held up really well looks and feels ad good as it did when I got it. Been using it daily through 2 pregnannies and for nursing. Works well for both the couch and the bed. I defintely recommend this for anyone who needs back support
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, soft, and supportive
customer_reviews.text: I've never liked these reading pillows, but since having a baby, it really comes in handy. This pillow is very soft but still supportive enough to keep you up and comfortable for long periods of time. Excellent for sitting in bed, holding and rocking our little one. Would be great for reading as well. I'm quite short so it's perfect height for me, but for someone taller, may want to opt for the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Evin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balance of soft and supportive. I initially bought one for my dad who needs some extra support while sitting on his couch. After getting a couple of chances to sit with it I bought one for myself to use while I’m in bed. Definitely would recommend and, after buying it, be sure to let it fluff for 24 hours and you’re going to enjoy its peek fluffiness.
customer_reviews.author: L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Great for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I have just passed the 24 hour resting period. On the first try, my back pain disappeared. Im 29, I play video games a lot, and this is going to be amazing. If I notice anything wrong, I'll come back and update my review with the issues. But for right now, 5 stars. Very much recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Designed for people with small or medium torsos. Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Designed for people with small or medium torsos. Generous width if you need that. I’d prefer something taller and narrower. Overall big and takes up almost 2/3 of queen Bed. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice soft support pillow BUT the support is just not as strong as I was hoping for. I really wanted a nice support pillow for when I am on the flore with my baby but you have to have a couch or bed for it to maintain its support. Which defeats what I am needing it for.
customer_reviews.author: Shellye

customer_reviews.title: A God Send!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had surgery and realized at the very last minute I needed something like this for my recovery. I took a chance and ordered it, it arrived in 24 hours and has been a god send ever since. I’m so happy with practicality and the quality of this product. It’s so soft and the memory foam makes it incredibly comfortable and molds to the body. If it wasn’t for this product I would not be able to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Comfy pillow. You do need for it to be leaning against something to get full support. Mine did not come with a head piece as some others stated. Packaging and delivery was great. Especially great considering how much I've been sitting lately. Give it a day or so to fluff to full capacity!
customer_reviews.author: PayJo38

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice, just a bit short
customer_reviews.text: When you take it out of the box, it looks very small and flexible, but it just takes a while to fluff up. It does have a weird smell at first, but that goes away within a few days. It’s very soft and the cover is a very nice velvety material. My one complaint is how short it is. Even though it’s a “large” the extra large probably would have been better as this is going to be too short for most adults.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Toxic off gassing of foam made my eyes water
customer_reviews.text: I am not familiar with memory foam, but I would guess it is chips of selvedge which fill this back pillow. I didn’t know it could smell so bad. Acrid and noxious. It stank coming out of the wrapping and nearly knocked me out the first time I pushed air out by reclining on it. After 3 days it is improved, but I can’t use it. I rather have my lumpy cotton and poly one back from college days.
customer_reviews.author: Wallygirl

customer_reviews.title: I love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: At the end of the day, I love these pillows!!! The one initial turn off (that went away) is that they did "smell" of the memory foam. The smell did 100% dissipate. I WISH they were larger, a bit more "adultish" size, but push comes to shove it does get the job done with support and comfort! I do love the fact that you can take off the cover and wash it. I would not hesitate to purchase again, hope the manufacturer reads this and makes the reading pillow bigger, I would buy more and find a use for them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathyd242424

customer_reviews.title: Well worth price!. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Super soft outside and super comfy to lean against. Good support!. The removable entire outside will make this easy to clean. All the details from packaging to product are top notch!. Even came with a letter opener type cutter to assist with cutting the plastic away without damaging the product!. We didn't see it until we had the plastic off but cool/great idea all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tingley

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Any average size adult will need an XL, which I got. I have a queen size bed and as you can see in the photo, it takes up half the space which is perfect for me. It came vacuum sealed and luckily NO scent. After 24 hrs (I unzipped it slightly) it was good to go. It’s nice and soft and the color is exactly as pictured by the seller. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Le'Annka

customer_reviews.title: Like Reclining  on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: So this pillow comes vacuum packed and needs a few hours to expand to its full plushness. Once it does tho... holey comfort Batman!! My literal first thoughts after settling into bed with this support pillow were that it is like my bed is trying to hug me. Unbelievably comfortable and compact. Love love love it. My husband is so jealous over how giggly I am that I am ordering him one in the morning. If I could give this 10 stars out of 5 I would.
customer_reviews.author: Scubagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great support for taller people
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my college-age son, who's a bit over 6' tall. I was almost taken aback when the pillow arrived- it was large and hefty. Turned out to be the perfect fit for my son and his dorm bed. Caught my quite tall husband using it too- may have to order another. Nice material. I let it air out as instructions say for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: randi scher

customer_reviews.title: Returned, didn't live up to the description
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as it wasn't tall enough to provide any real comfortable support, nor were the arm rests in a way to make it comfy either. It was just too soft and not supportive enough. The cover itself was super soft, but the rest just failed.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra F

customer_reviews.title: Stains on cover upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: The pillow arrived yesterday and while it has been sitting for 24-48 hours as recommended to fully rise after vacuum-packaging I noticed that there are several light brown stains on the fabric of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Storms Brother

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this while I was in the hospital after my c section. It expands quickly from the packaging which was good because it arrived the day I returned from the hospital. It has been super helpful for nursing and just for me to sleep in general. It’s super comfortable I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Still not Quite
customer_reviews.text: This support is OK but was still smaller than I expected, even after reading all the reives and ino. It just feels smaller. I would not recommend for an adult and I am only 5 ft. tall. I wish the back was taller to support my head. I wish it would feel just a bit more "squishy" to relax "into". The side "arms" are OK but again a bit longer would be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, large pillow
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to sit up in bed and do work from my laptop at night . The pillow came in a small box, and I was nervous I had ordered the wrong size. However, it fluffed up very nicely, and it quite comfortable. It is a bit heavy to lift, but it is very well made and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: What surprised me was the size of the package it arrived in. How could a reading pillow fit into such a small box? Upon taking it out of the carton, it expanded to its full size over several minutes. However, its full size is smaller than others I have owned. There was a sheen to the fabric which made it look plastic-like, but is entirely functional and possible easier to clean, although I haven' tried that yet. I am generally satisfied with the product and have used it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: George F.

customer_reviews.title: Help for my shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: Seven weeks ago I injured my shoulder. I wanted something to help with sitting up straight because good posture helps with my injury. I like your product. But I am not yet truly satisfied with it. I will keep using it and hope it helps my shoulder. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The pillow came compressed in a box. When you open it, it is greatly reduced in size. It actually takes a couple of days to "grow"to it's real size. It is sturdy. It is supportive. I do wish it was a little bit taller, maybe 3 to 4 inches. That being said, I like it a lot and appreciate being able to sit up more comfortably in bed. My only negative is I'm not crazy about the gray fabric. It's not pretty, but I can cover it so it's fine. And it was pretty cheap!"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge reading pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I ordered the extra large one. It was much bigger than I expected. It is huge; takes up a lot of my queen size bed. Unfortunately, one of the buttons that attach the neck pillow broke off the first day. So, I can no longer attach it. Also, my hair keeps catching on the other button.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love it, buy xL if adult
customer_reviews.text: Saw all the complaints about the standard so I got the XL. I'm 5"7 avg. weight and it's perfect for my height and size. Memory foam squishes but comes back fast. Pretty heavy for a pillow! But I like it for reading and studying. Very supportive, love the adjustable neck pillow that comes with the XL
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bought it mainly for watching movies while I am in bed so I can sit up so I wont be breaking my neck the whole movie and man I use this thing for so much more sometimes I even lay it flat down on its back and just lay it and use it as a pillow. The material is really soft and when I use it as a "chair" on my bed it does a great job. $33 well spent !!
customer_reviews.author: Gabor Ambruzs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cool, Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on these types of pillows and chose these as they fit all the major criteria. Easy to move around, super comfortable, don't get too warm, and totally affordable. So happy I bought one for my husband too. Only somewhat negative thing I could say is that they are heavier than expected, but the handle at the top helps with that. Highly recommend these pillows!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. McKinley Trimble

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I read in bed.This works perfectly for me.I'm 5'7" and large built and the regular size fit great.It's so comfy,I'm able to relax and fall asleep much easier than using pillows I couldn't get positioned right.I've also had spinal surgery and needed the support. Would buy again if needed. Had no trouble with smell,fluffed up as needed. All in all very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love it---soft and comfortable---came packaged well---I unpacked it and let it sit for a couple hours......fits me perfect, 5'10" / 170 lbs........ no smell at all..... I wanted one in brown, it wasn't offered, otherwise it would have gotten a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Especially good if you intend to sit straight up in bed
customer_reviews.text: I tend to wind up slouching a little so put my pillow in front of it. It performs the task I expected of it, good support in bed while watching TV or reading. People have commented on it being heavy but I consider this a plus as it is a solid support. Keep in mind that it is big and can't be folded down to hide away somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is disappointing, it slips and slides, it’s way too soft. No back support while sitting in bed. The only reason I have not returned this “mess of a pillow” it’s because I am not in the USA and it cost a bundle to Import & ship & clear with customs. But this is not near what I expected, I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: humphrey clarke

customer_reviews.title: Well made lovely product, very soft.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and soft. Note it does compress a lot and if you are trying to use it without a flat surface behind it it may not provide enough support.
customer_reviews.author: tanstaafl

customer_reviews.title: Very Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I can only speak for the larger version of this reading pillow but ... Well, You have to lean on it for a few minutes ... warm it up a little ... then hits you. Suddenly everything feels luxurious, laid back. It makes you feel like you're rich in your own private palace.
customer_reviews.author: Turquoise  Mood

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The added neck ring as very helpful when reading in bed. It's a bit heavy but well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Unsupportive
customer_reviews.text: Too thin, too flimsy. Doesn't come close to providing the support necessary from a pillow to keep you updated. I often put a pillow behind it and in front of it to add the extra support it should already have. Not recommended at all. Pay more, get better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The perfect reading pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This was much bigger than I imagined...but that is a good thing. My husband had surgery and had to remain in bed for 2 weeks. I bought him this so that he could sit up watch TV and eat. This reading pillow provided much more support. It is just right in firmness and big enough to offer support to a big person.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: It's too small and not too much support
customer_reviews.text: I totally disliked the product. It doesnt hold you enough and less if your a muscled developed person. I mean this should fit but because is memory foam this only goes down and keeps getting down like it wont hold it size. I wouldn't buy this again. Is just a regular pillow like the ones you get on any market
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lira

customer_reviews.title: Better than you think
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously more comfortable than you might think. My wife loves it tremendously and won’t let me use it since she now claims sole ownership of it. The one drawback is the “leaving it in an airy room for 24-48 hrs” thing. It’s not ready to use out of the box BUT it makes perfect sense that they would do it that way
customer_reviews.author: dav28

customer_reviews.title: Finally... reading in bed is comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've made for myself in a long time. I live with my 3 grown daughters so my bedroom is my sanctuary. It's very uncomfortable to bunch pillows up to rest against to sit in bed and read or watch TV. Enter the reading pillow and problem solved. It's comfortable and solid enough to support my back and neck when I inevitably fall asleep with a book in my hand. My daughter loves the one I bought her as well. Definitely glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because I wanted to lean up against the wall and be comfortable. Putting pillows behind my back did not do it and hurt my spine and was extremely uncomfortable. But this pillow has been amazing and I've used it almost very day since purchasing! Has great back support and doesn't hurt after extended use. I never realized how great this was but now I take it to friends' houses for movie nights and have recommended it to many friends. If you do a lot of movies, reading in bed, etc., this is a must have and will really improve your day to day activities!
customer_reviews.author: SPDRMN

customer_reviews.title: Soft, firm, comfy, but no standing alone support.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is firm, soft, and comfy but no standing support. As in, you have to lean it against the wall. I bought it so I could sit in the middle of my bed and play my game since the controller card isnt long enough to reach the back of the bed. But it has no support on it's own. Overall I am happy that i can use it when I'm reading, but not how I actually wanted to use it. Remember to wait 24 hours to let it fluff up before use, or it just looks like a crappy pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rogers

customer_reviews.title: All in one pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile pillow that can be used for reading, sleeping, watching TV, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Looks good; comfy fabric
customer_reviews.text: Used on non-Milliard pillow from Bed Bath & Beyond. Fits with just a little extra fabric on the bottom; you can't even see it. Nice, soft light grey fabric that seems high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: CAI

customer_reviews.title: Level of comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Sitting at almost 90 degrees angle becomes uncomfortable after time. It would be nice to allow for some change of angle of the back support.
customer_reviews.author: pleasant19

customer_reviews.title: Good for back support
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from foot surgery and spending many hours daily in bed with my foot elevated. Pillows needed constant readjusting and my back was becoming painful. When this pillow can it was all squished and hard. I was planning to send it back until the next day when it had expanded. I put a flat bed pillow on my low back and it is now perfect for me to sit against for hours at a time. The material is soft and comfortable Be aware it is very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product - bad odor 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, although this is soft comfortable and a serves the purpose well, the foam chips inside give off a very “fishy” smell . I let it sit for several days with zipper opened but the smell is still very off- putting . The smell even soaks through to your clothing & bedding. I don’t know if it is only my item or if all of this product has this odor.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Geary

customer_reviews.title: Makes reading or watching TV in bed much more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's an oversize pillow with no moving parts, so not much to go wrong. It does exactly what I wanted it to do - make reading and watching TV in bed much more comfortable. Only down side that I can see so far is that it took a couple of weeks to get that "industrial" smell out of it.
customer_reviews.author: roadrider73

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great support
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom so she doesn’t slouch when she sitting on the bed. It’s really comfortable and provides good support. It’s also small enough that she can lift it on and off the bed. When it first came, I couldn’t believe it would get as big as it did. Overall, we’re very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fat, comfy pillow for reclining to read or watch TV. It is a bit narrow, so there isn't much wiggle room from side to side. I bought it for my husband, but he is really buff and broad, so it didn't quite fit his back. However, it fits for me perfectly! I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: yay ILNP

customer_reviews.title: Fine for what it offers, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The pillow fluffed up significantly within the first few minutes after taking it out of the box, although probably not to its fullest capacity (understandable since the instructions say to allow it 24-48 hours for it to fully expand). I am returning it though. I am 5' 1.5", and my torso is about 27"; this pillow is too short for my taste and felt awkward to lean against. The material also feels like one-way velvet, and I hate one-way velvet (i.e., it feels smooth when it's stroked in one direction and jagged when it's stroked in a different direction).
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reading Pillow for the. Ed
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has the right mixture of support and comfort. The washable cover is a must. Do read the instructions however as the stuffing is highly flammable. Something to watch if using heating pads or electric blankets should they not be in top working order.
customer_reviews.author: brick house

customer_reviews.title: A bit to firm for me
customer_reviews.text: Too firm, big and bulky for me. I returned it but it is a very nice pillow just not what I was looking for. You can take filling out but I didn’t want to deal with that and just used my down pillows with one good very firm pillow in between for recoup after surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Madzoeytwist

customer_reviews.title: Back support when you don't have one
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my kids (8 & 11). These work great for them to read in bed, watch tv, or just relax. I am shorter and this works well for me too. Its way more comfortable then using pillows to lean up against on the floor or in bed. Great accessory for kids rooms.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! It came rolled up in an airtight sealed bag. As soon as it was opened, it began to take shape. 24 hours later it was completely filled out. There were no lumps or anything to fluff out. I love how soft it is. The height and fill are perfect as well. I had purchased a more expensive one for another family member, but I like mine better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for college and it serves its purpose well! Took it out of the box, laid it on a flat surface as directed and within 24 hours it was full and upright. No dryer time needed. Can't speak to the comfort and support yet since it wasn't for me, but the feel of it is soft on the outside, and it feels like it will be very supportive with all the fill that's in it. Perfect and solid construction, feels like it will last a lifetime. Great value, very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E.

product_meta.title: Milliard Reading Pillow with Shredded Memory Foam, Great As Backrest for Books Or Gaming- 18x15 inches (Sit up Pillow)
feature_bullets: Spill the beans on beanbag cushions and try our soft, luscious foam reading pillows instead. Curl up in bed or on the couch, floor with a good book and relax in our pillow’s arms for comfort and support.

Pillow too firm? Pull some stuffing out. Too soft? Put more stuffing in! The accessible foam insert lets you customize your own comfort and extend your pillow’s service life with fresh foam available from Milliard. Shredded memory foam offers many of the same benefits as its solid alternative, but is lighter, airier, and still molds itself to your comfort.
Zippered velour outer cover has a convenient carry handle for portability, and is easily removable and machine washable for quick cleanup of spills and stains.
Great For: Reading in bed, Curling up on the sofa, Sleeping upright for nasal congestion or acid reflux (heartburn), leg arm and back elevator also works for any sort of bed rest.

All Milliard foam products are vacuum-packed for freshness and should be left to expand for at least 24-48 hours to reach full size. CertiPUR certified. Available in Extra Large, Standard and Petite sizes with replacement covers also available.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,266 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
